import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { fetchStudentById } from "../services/studentServices" export const Student = () => { const [student, setStudent] = useState({}) const { studentId } = useParams() const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchStudentById(studentId).then((data) => { setStudent(data) }) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, [studentId]) return ( <>

  • {person.name}

    {person.email}

    {person.role}

    {person.lastSeen ? (

    Last seen {person.lastSeen}

    ) : (

    Online

    )}
) }
